Package org.cooperari.config

Annotations for test configuration.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CBaseConfiguration
    Default configuration for test execution.
  • Annotation Types Summary 
    Annotation Type Description
    CAlways
    Specify hotspots that should always be reached by a trial in a test session.
    CDetectResourceDeadlocks
    Configure detection of resource deadlocks.
    CGenerateCoverageReports
    Configure the generation of coverage reports per test.
    CInstrument
    Configure bytecode instrumentation.
    CMaxTrials
    Configure the maximum number of trials per test method.
    CNever
    Specify hotspots that should never be reached by a trial in a test session.
    CRaceDetection
    Annotation to enable race detection.
    CScheduling
    Configure thread scheduling.
    CSometimes
    Specify hotspots that should be reached at least by one trial in a test session.
    CTimeLimit
    Configure a time limit for test trials.
    CTraceOptions
    Configure options for execution trace files.

Package org.cooperari.config Description

Annotations for test configuration.
Since:
0.2
